TopicTitle: InfiniteDice Boat parts carrier craft file

Articles.Content: I have downloaded InfiniteDice boat parts, but I don't know how to assemble an aircraft carrier from the parts given. So, can someone please give me a .craft file for a simple aircraft carrier?
In BoatParts 4.6: have you found BoatPartsR3\Crafts subdirectory and copied the crafts to your KSP\Ships\SPH ?
Thanks! I found it and now I have my reference craft file
